evidence.claim: Caliper ensures compliance with HIPAA regulations for health data privacy and security.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health information exchange.
Caliper leverages HL7 messaging for interoperability in EHR systems.
Integration with X12 transaction sets is facilitated for health insurance claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on health tech and X12 integration suggests alignment with API-first data exchange.
